## Calcluate percentage covered from bed graph

Given a BAM file is unavailable, we would like to determine from a bedGraph file - the percentage of a particular peak is covered by sequencing reads

The workflow consits of these main steps  
* Step 1 - Edit the bedGraph file  
* Step 2 - Bin the edited bedGraph file
* Step 3 - Perform read counting
* Step 4 - Getting summary of percentage covered
